headline: Forecasts for Hotter US Weather Boost Nat-Gas Prices
summary: August Nymex natural gas (NGQ25 ) on Friday closed up +0.016 (+0.52%). Aug nat-gas prices recovered from early losses Friday and settled higher after US weather forecasts shifted to warmer, which would boost nat-gas demand from electricity providers for air conditioning usage. Forecaster Atmospheric G2 said Friday that forecasts shifted...

headline: Shale Stumbles Again as U.S. Rig Count Drops Further
summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States fell this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Friday as operators continue to scale back activity amid weak prices and cautious capital spending.

raw.headline: Shale Stumbles Again as U.S. Rig Count Drops Further
raw.summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States fell this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Friday as operators continue to scale back activity amid weak prices and cautious capital spending.

headline: Chevron Stock Is Flexing Its Muscles. 3 More Attractive Energy Plays to Watch.
summary: Energy stocks are starting to flourish, boosted by a string of solid earnings reports.  It’s been a bumpy ride for energy this year, because of overall soft crude prices and macroeconomic uncertainty.  The widely followed Energy Select Sector SPDR exchange-traded fund has declined 3% so far in 2025, lagging far behind the  nearly 9% gain.

headline: Baker Hughes: Data Center And LNG Optimism Builds (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Baker Hughes posted strong Q2 results with IET momentum and solid margins, but valuation now looks fair after a rally. Find out why BKR stock is a hold.
